main.name: Ben Bartholomew
main.description: I'm a Senior Computer Science/Business & Management double major at Knox College. I'm currently looking for software development opportunities for Summer 2023. I'm a Full Stack Software Engineer and this website is a showcase of me and my projects
main.bio: A 22 year old baseball player and sport enthusiast. My lifelong involvement in sport has lead me to develop a competitive nature the ability to not only make myself better but others better around me in a team. I love learning new languages and frameworks but I'm most confortable with Java, Dart, Python and C#. Outside of coding I enjoy playing and watching sports, gaming and eating food.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to get in touch with me. My professional email is benjamenbartholomew@gmail.com.

resume.skillmessage: Flexible. Full-Stack. Fine-tuned. With room for improvement and learning.
resume.resumeintro: A brief summary of my most inluencial and important experiences.

education.degree: B.S. in Computer Science & B.A. in Business and Management
education.description: Learned logic and fundamentals of computer science and also developed my skills by working on lengthy team projects all while having a busy extra ciricular life with NCAA baseball and Fraternity life.

work.title: Chief Technology Officer & Founder
work.description: Built a functional mobile app from scratch in less than 4 weeks. Dealt with all the hardships and growing pains of a startup. More information below.

work.title: Full-Stack Engineer Intern
work.description: Interned for a data management startup out of Ottawa. Worked in close collaboration with two senior developers to create a first-of-its-kind apache pulsar product and website add-on from the ground up. Kesque was later acquired by DataStax less than three months after I left.
